message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to let it go for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $115?
I'm willing to meet you halfway too, Alice. How about we compromise at $112? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about we discuss $114?
I'm getting close to your final offer, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $113. That's the lowest I can go. Can you accept that?
I think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $114, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. It's the best I can do.
